message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_OEG_OPM_9-12-2010.pdf: Página 6
1
OPM Overview
Accounts
•
Mechanism by which multiple descriptions of a same execution can co-exist in a 
same OPM graph
•
Different accounts may be provided by different observers (or asserters)
•
Accounts can overlap if they have some OPM subgraph in common
•
An account can be a refinement of another, if it provides more details
– Support for hierarchical descriptions
•
Accounts may be conflicting!
speaker: SYSTEM
